annonstext:
Looking for a new start? Think bigger. Think Axis! 

Want to join a team that cultivates passion and drives innovation? At Axis, we believe in innovating for a smarter, safer world. We just happen to provide cutting-edge security solutions across the globe. While each Axian has his or her own motivators, we all share the same core values.

We're now looking for an ERP Application Specialist to strengthen our ERP & Supporting Systems team. As an ERP Application Specialist at Axis you will be one of our key players in developing and supporting our global IFS implementation which supports many of Axis' core functions. 

The position is based at our HQ in Lund, or at our office in Linköping. 

Who is your future team?
As an ERP Application Specialist you will be a member of the IFS team, which is part of our ERP & Supporting Systems team. The ERP & Supporting Systems team consists of 4 different sub-teams with responsibility of some of our core business applications at Axis; IFS, ServiceNow, Jira/Confluence, Digital Asset Management and DocuSign. Our responsibility covers the full application lifecycle including day-to-day support, continuous improvement projects and upgrades.

We are a diverse team with a good mix from a gender, age and experience point of view and we all show up with an open mindset, eager to support each other and with a joint focus on what's best for Axis. 

What will you do here as ERP Application Specialist?
Our EPR platform, IFS Applications, is a global solution which supports many of our core functions within Axis, like for example manufacturing, warehousing, order fulfillment, purchasing and finance.

As an ERP Application Specialist you will work together with your teammates and users with issues and questions both related to day-to-day support as well as future development projects. You will have a close cooperation with stakeholders both related to our central functions in Lund and our Regions across the globe.

Your responsibilities will for example include:

 * Creating and updating lobbies using SQL statements
 * Set up configurations and customizations
 * Manage gap analysis related to new requests and new solutions
 * Implement new features as well as simplifying and standardizing existing functionality

Who are we looking for/Who are you?
We are looking for a team player who finds it easy and stimulating to work with new people spread out in our own organization and through our external partners. Like us, you value teamwork and want to contribute to our great team spirit. You are creative and like to share your ideas and knowledge with the team. You have experience from working with IFS or similar ERP applications and feel ready to take the next step in your career.

We'd love to hear that you have/are:

 * Good understanding of any of the following processes in IFS (or similar ERP application): Finance, Distribution, Manufacturing, Warehousing or Purchasing
 * Experience in working in a mixed environment of managing both on-going support and projects
 * Ability to take initiative to identify, track and resolve issues
 * Bonus points for experience in working with PL/SQL

What Axis have to offer
Yes, we might be a little biased, but working at Axis is indeed a privilege. We are surrounded by great colleagues, and our culture is characterized by openness, curiosity, trust and honesty. We care about your individual progress and about you as a person. While we love what we do and work hard during office hours, we also value other things in life: our bike parking tends to be quite empty after five o'clock.

Ready to Act?
Enough said. Now it´s time for you to act! We're looking forward to seeing you!
If you want to find out more contact our recruiting manager FIRSTNAME LASTNAME at  TELEPHONENO
